article.Heading: Sensex & Nifty weak, market eyes Budget; Hero down 2%
article.Summary: SBI, ICICI Bank, Tata Steel, ONGC and Dr Reddy's are top gainers while Hero MotoCorp, HUL, Bajaj Auto, Maruti and GAIL are down.
article.Body:
Moneycontrol Bureau

The Sensex is down 18.94 points at 23135.36 and the Nifty is down 8.70 points at 7021.05. About 786 shares have advanced, 748 shares declined, and 69 shares are unchanged.

SBI, ICICI Bank, Tata Steel, ONGC and Dr Reddy's are top gainers while Hero MotoCorp, HUL, Bajaj Auto, Maruti and GAIL are down.

The Indian rupee opened lower by 9 paise at 68.69 per dollar on Monday versus 68.60 Friday. Chief Economic Advisor Arvind Subramanian said there is more scope for lowering of interest rates by the RBI as inflation is under control.

Posted by Nasrin Sultana
Follow @NasrinzStory
